title: Episode 17: Energy Medicine: an Interview with Pat Heavren
description:
In the first of a series of interviews with therapists who practice alternative therapeutic techniques, Pat Heavren of Energy Medicine Wellness in Woodbridge, Connectitcut joins me for a discussion...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Ever heard of Energy Medicine? Learn more about it this week on The Psych Files.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
